com.cmput301f16t09.unter

Class PostListMainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301f16t09.unter.PostListMainController

  • public class PostListMainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Post list main controller which handles using the PostList Offline or Online Controllers depending on if WiFi is available or not.
